title: Add entitlement
content:
This page explains how to add an entitlement record.

Add entitlement

  1. Click the  ​> Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Entitlements. This directs you to the Entitlements tab, which displays the entitlements added in the agent interface.
  3. Click New.
  4. Specify the following details:

    Field

    Description

    Display label

    The display label for the entitlement.

    Entitlement type

    The entitlement type. Currently, this field has only one option: Product. A 'Product' type entitlement grants users the permissions to raise or view requests for a product.

    Owner company

    The company that owns the entitlement.

    Contract

    The contract associated with the entitlement.

    Description

    A description of the entitlement.
  5. Click SAVE. This redirects you the Entitlements tab. You can see the entitlement record you created.
